Class SpecialVendingMachine

java.lang.Object
VendingMachine
SpecialVendingMachine
public class SpecialVendingMachine extends VendingMachine
The SpecialVendingMachine class is a subclass of VendingMachine that allows the user to create a special vending machine with a base item and a list of standalone and addon ingredients. The user can then choose the ingredients to add to the base item to create a customized item.

    • SpecialVendingMachine

      Constructs a new SpecialVendingMachine object with the given discount.

    • addAddonItem

      public void addAddonItem(String name, double price, int calories, Items.Item.ItemType itemType, String imageFilename)
      Adds an addon item to the special vending machine.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the addon item.
      price - The price of the addon item.
      calories - The number of calories in the addon item.
      itemType - The type of the addon item (e.g., DRINK, TOPPING, SAUCE, etc.).
      imageFilename - The filename of the image representing the addon item.

      public void resetCustomUIManager()
      Resets the custom UI manager to default settings after displaying custom dialogs.

    • displayCustomProduct

      public void displayCustomProduct()
      Displays a custom dialog showing additional toppings and addon ingredients available in the special vending machine. Allows the user to choose from the available options.

    • purchaseCustomProduct

      public void purchaseCustomProduct()
      Handles the purchase of a custom product in the special vending machine. Allows the user to select a base milk tea flavor, add add-ons, standalone ingredients, calculate the price, and complete the purchase.

    • selectAddons

      public void selectAddons(SpecialVendingMachine specialVendingMachine, List<Items.Item> chosenAddons)
      Handles the selection of add-on ingredients for the custom product.
      Parameters:
      specialVendingMachine - The instance of the SpecialVendingMachine.
      chosenAddons - The list to store the chosen add-on ingredients.
